subject: New MiniBox Files Posted In files section
author: bhali333
full_text:
Hey guy's

I just posted some minibox files in the files section under Bruce's box 
files, sub folder minibox files.

Please give a listen and let me know what you think.
There are two particular files there that pertain to me asking if any 
spirits came through during the session please go back and I ask mike & 
Lisa to acknowledge first she says NO and I say did you say NO I ask 
the question again and like with an impatient tone she says YESSSS!

I thought it was cool.

Bruce
